summary: The Forge in a New HD Design
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][COLOR=#00B050][SIZE=4]Smithing was never so beautiful[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F4FiE4Kl.jpg[/IMG]

[COLOR=#92D050][SIZE=4]Your New HD Design Forge[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[youtube]vvh8HapVpno[/youtube]

A different Version is also available here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41485//?

[youtube]7OQB7bk7HkI[/youtube]

We all have to do it and we all need it ! Blacksmithing ! So I have decided just to add more Design to my Forge. I was tired of the Vanilla look and even no other HD Texutre Mods added some different Materials or Colors to it. I have completely Redone the Blacksmithing Materials with completely new HD Textures from Scratch. Only the Finest Metal and Wood components were used to build this Forge.
Noble Woods like Honduran Rosewood and Walnut Wood and some other Woods were added in the Workbench and and other Wood components of the Forge. Better Hardened Metal for the Anvil,Hammer and Tonge.

You will see the Difference as soon as you see your Forge !

Also take a look at the Screenshots and watch the Video for Further Details !

So this Mod will change following Components of the New Design Forge HD

Blacksmith Hammer
Blacksmith Tonge
Blacksmith Anvil
Blacksmith Bellow
Blacksmith Forge the Stones around the Forge
Blacksmith Workbench
Blacksmith Workbenchtop
Blacksmith Grindstone
Blacksmith Sharpening Wheel Woods

If you like this Mod you can support with your Endorsments.

I am also working on another Version with other Materials and different look.

Enjoy now your new Design Blacksmith Forge in HD ! 1K+2K New Textures

If you dont like the too Shiny look of some components of the Forge you can download the Optional Hotfix for the Shiny look. Install the Hotfix after the Main Version.

Credits to Nexus and Bethesda
Credits to Obsidian Dawn for some Textures I have used.

HXP[/CENTER]
author: HXP
